email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

I hope you're doing well. We have a shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this route? We are looking for a CIF arrangement.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN QUEEN for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. Our starting freight quote is USD 45.50/MT on a CIF basis. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-10-20.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charter Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider a lower rate, say USD 43.00/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

I understand your concern. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 44.00/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. We agree to the rate of USD 44.00/MT. Please confirm the laycan and ensure the vessel is ready for loading by 2023-10-20.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Great! The laycan is confirmed as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. We will ensure the vessel is ready for loading by then. I will send over the recap shortly.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily
